The #renewablefuelstandard (RFS) has failed to meet its goal of reducing GHG emissions while imposing costs on small refiners and consumers. I am glad @EPA has taken the legally required step of issuing hardship waivers to small refineries to mitigate the damage of the program.

The tax reform bill was created to simplify the tax code, not add burdens to nonprofits.

Met with representatives from nonprofits across OK & discussed charitable giving & my LIFT for Charities Act w/@ChrisCoons.
